item.title: The poorest among us
item.author: hello@aishikrehman.com (Aishik Rehman)
item.description: Abundance shows up in many ways, but poverty doesn’t. That’s why it’s hard to tell who’s really the poorest among us. In a world where abundance flaunts its myriad forms, poverty often remains hidden in the shadows, devoid of conspicuous manifestations. The stark contrast between the visibility of abundance and the invisibility of poverty raises poignant questions about the true essence of deprivation and the challenges in identifying those who are truly impoverished.
